1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Operators for text match.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Char
6 ( -- * Type
7   CharExpr,
8
9   -- * Character
10   char, word,
11   space, spaces, spaces1,
12   digit, letter,
13   ascii, latin1,
14
15   -- * General category
16   categorySet, categoryList,
17   category,
18
19   -- * Conversion
20   asLower,
21   asUpper,
22 ) where
23
24import qualified Data.Char                                   as Ch
25import qualified Data.Set                                    as Set
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                    as O
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Fn                 as O
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr                as T
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Basic      as T
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Repeat     as T
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Combine    as T
32
33-- | Subtext expression for character input.
34type CharExpr t = T.Expr t Char
35
36-- | Match some character in a list of characters.
37char :: [Char] -> CharExpr t
38char = T.list
39
40-- | Match some word in a list of words from space-separated string.
41word :: (O.Textual t) => t -> CharExpr t
42word w = T.or (T.equal <$> O.tWords w)
43
44-- | Match space character.
45space :: CharExpr t
46space = T.elem "space" Ch.isSpace
47
48-- | Match zero-or-more space characters.
49spaces :: CharExpr t
50spaces = T.many space
51
52-- | Match one-or-more space characters.
53spaces1 :: CharExpr t
54spaces1 = T.many1 space
55
56-- | Match digit characters.
57digit :: CharExpr t
58digit = T.elem "digit" Ch.isDigit
59
60-- | Match letter characters.
61letter :: CharExpr t
62letter = T.elem "letter" Ch.isLetter
63
64-- | Match first 128 characters of Unicode character set.
65ascii :: CharExpr t
66ascii = T.elem "letter" Ch.isAscii
67
68-- | Match first 256 characters of Unicode character set.
69latin1 :: CharExpr t
70latin1 = T.elem "letter" Ch.isLatin1
71
72
73-- --------------------------------------------  Category
74
75-- | Test unicode general category with category set.
76categorySet :: Set.Set Ch.GeneralCategory -> CharExpr t
77categorySet cs = T.elem "category" cat where
78    cat c = Ch.generalCategory c `Set.member` cs
79
80-- | Test unicode general category with category list.
81categoryList :: [Ch.GeneralCategory] -> CharExpr t
82categoryList = categorySet . Set.fromList
83
84-- | Test unicode general category with short names.
85--   The argument string is space-separated names.
86--   If unknown name is given, returns the name in 'Left' data.
87category :: String -> Either String (CharExpr t)
88category s =
89    do cs <- O.categoryLookup `mapM` words s
90       Right $ categorySet $ Set.unions cs
91
92
93-- --------------------------------------------  Conversion
94
95-- | Convert matched text into lower case.
96asLower :: (O.Textual t) => CharExpr t -> CharExpr t
97asLower = T.as (O.Fn "lower" $ O.map Ch.toLower)
98
99-- | Convert matched text into upper case.
100asUpper :: (O.Textual t) => CharExpr t -> CharExpr t
101asUpper = T.as (O.Fn "upper" $ O.map Ch.toUpper)
